text: I think that it would be better to do it the other way around: change the code to import from `discriminant_analysis`, and add a note saying that in old versions of scikit-learn, it was imported from lda. Indeed, change in sklearn has occurred in the 0.17 release, which was in November 2015, so that's quite a while ago.
